籤詩版本二:
No ka laʻana, ʻaʻole nalo ka papa ʻekolu, ʻehā, a me ʻelima o ka mahina mahina mua, ʻaʻohe hapa, ʻaʻohe hapa, a ʻaʻole i piha.
Ke kali nei i ka ʻaina awakea i ka lā ʻumikumamālima o ka makahiki, ʻālohilohi a piha nā mea a pau
詩意:
Ma kēia hexagram, nalo ka mahina akā ʻaʻole piha.
E ahonui i na mea a pau.
解曰: E noho conservative a kali. E like me ka malama mua o ka malama. Ke kali nei i ka manawa puni. ʻAʻohe mea ʻino.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Ua piʻi ʻo Li Yuan i ka noho aliʻi
I nā makahiki hope loa o ka moʻokūʻauhau Sui, ʻo ka Emperor Yang o ka moʻokūʻauhau Sui i hana ʻino a hoʻomāʻewaʻewa, e leʻaleʻa ana i nā wahi a pau, e hoʻonāukiuki ana i ka poʻe a me ka hoʻokaʻawale ʻana i ke aupuni i waena o nā koa.
I ka makahiki 618 AD, ua hoʻokumu ʻo Yu Wenhuaji, Sima Dekan, Pei Qantong a me nā mea ʻē aʻe i kipi e pepehi iā Emperor Yang o ka Moʻokūʻauhau Sui a hoʻolaha ʻo Yang Hao i mōʻī.
Ma hope koke iho, pepehi ʻo Yu Wenhuaji iā Qin Wanghao a hoʻolaha iā ia iho ʻo Emperor Xu, e hoʻokumu ana i ka ʻāina Xu.
I ka makahiki aʻe, ua luku pū ʻia ʻo ia e Tang general Li Shentong a me Xia mōʻī Dou Jiande.
Ma hope o ka ʻike ʻana o ka ʻāina ʻo Central Plains i ka make ʻana o Emperor Yang, ua kākoʻo ʻo Luoyang kiaʻi ʻo Wang Shichong i ka Mōʻī Dong o Yue i mōʻī, ʻo ia hoʻi, ʻo Emperor Ai o Sui Dynasty.
I kēia manawa, hoʻopau ʻo Li Yuan iā Yang You, a hoʻolaha iā ia iho he mōʻī ma Taiyuan, a hoʻololi i ka inoa o ka ʻāina iā Tang. ʻO Tang Gaozu kēia.
聖意: Makemake ka home a me ka hale iā ʻoe iho, pōmaikaʻi i ke kauwela a me ka hāʻule, e makaʻala i nā kālepa, kali i ka manawa, ua lohi ka male, hānau ʻo Liujia i kahi kaikamahine, paʻa nā mea hele wāwae, paʻa nā ilo silika, paʻa nā holoholona, ​​paʻakikī. e ʻimi i nā kānaka, mālama ʻia nā hoʻopiʻi lehulehu a me ka neʻe ʻana, paʻakikī ka waiwai nalowale, paʻakikī ke kūkulu ʻana i ka maʻi, hoʻouna i ka hale kupapaʻu mauna, a hoʻololi.
古人: Ua piʻi ʻo Li Yuan i ka noho aliʻi
